title: Ex-Developer Jailed Four Years for Sabotaging Ohio Employer with Kill-Switch Malware
description: A 55-year-old Chinese national has been sentenced to four years in prison and three years of supervised release for sabotaging his former employer's network with custom malware and deploying a kill switch that locked out employees when his account was disabled.
